comments.comment: Man photo gahala pennuwa mata 1000k dada gahuwa waradda ira kapuwa eka nm ay bn ekata noleewe hethuwa man photo gaha gaththa nisa baya una ...kauda mewata waga kiyanne bn naduth hamuduruwange baduth hamuduruwange api thalenawa bike 3 weel okunta oennama bene ..man ekai kiyanne me rate dada wadi une ape waradin newei bn palakayange sakkili kamata aseemitha blayak dunnama wadurata dalipihiya ahu una wage thama unuth kapan apeth kapagannawa mata banapalla eth man kewe aththa üôè
